Nodes.Name: BambooHR
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we use the BambooHR node to retrieve a list of Employees.

Properties.Description: Unique identifier for the sample operation.
Properties.Name: OperationId

Properties.Description: A brief description or summary of the operation.
Properties.Name: Description

Nodes.Name: ForEach
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are using a For Each node to iterate through each employee record found in the Bamboo payload.

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are formatting the Key, so that it corresponds to the  key used in the Sage payload, as well as the key used for the Key Value records.

Nodes.Name: GetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we check the Key value records to see if this records has been processed before. If nothing found, it will process.

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription: We are using the If node to check found KV records, to see that they weren't successful. We don't want to process Success records.

Nodes.Name: QuickMap
Nodes.LongDescription: We are using the Quickmap node to do some validations and format the payload into a Sage friendly format. Note the change to the CustomerID, which is now our Key.

Properties.Name: Mapping
Properties.Value:

Nodes.Name: SageIntacct
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we are creating Customer records in Sage Intacct, one by one.

Properties.Schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="Request">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="CUSTOMER">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="CUSTOMERID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="NAME" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="DISPLAYCONTACT">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="PRINTAS" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="COMPANYNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="TAXABLE" type="xs:boolean"/>
                    <xs:element name="TAXGROUP" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="PREFIX" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="FIRSTNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="LASTNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="INITIAL" type="xs:string"/>
                    <xs:element name="PHONE1" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                    <xs:element name="PHONE2" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                    <xs:element name="CELLPHONE" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                    <xs:element name="PAGER" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                    <xs:element name="FAX" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
                    <xs:element name="EMAIL1"/>
                    <xs:element name="EMAIL2"/>
                    <xs:element name="URL1"/>
                    <xs:element name="URL2"/>
                    <xs:element name="MAILADDRESS">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="ADDRESS1" type="xs:string"/>
                          <xs:element name="ADDRESS2" type="xs:string"/>
                          <xs:element name="CITY" type="xs:string"/>
                          <xs:element name="STATE" type="xs:string"/>
                          <xs:element name="ZIP" type="xs:unsignedInt"/>
                          <xs:element name="COUNTRY" type="xs:string"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ONETIME" type="xs:boolean"/>
              <xs:element name="STATUS" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT" type="xs:boolean"/>
              <xs:element name="CUSTTYPE" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="PARENTID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="GLGROUP" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="TERRITORYID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="SUPDOCID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="TERMNAME" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO" type="xs:unsignedShort"/>
              <xs:element name="ARACCOUNT" type="xs:unsignedShort"/>
              <xs:element name="SHIPPINGMETHOD" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="RESALENO" type="xs:unsignedByte"/>
              <xs:element name="TAXID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CREDITLIMIT" type="xs:decimal"/>
              <xs:element name="ONHOLD" type="xs:boolean"/>
              <xs:element name="DELIVERY_OPTIONS" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CUSTMESSAGEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="COMMENTS" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CURRENCY" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OEQUOTEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OEORDERPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OELISTPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OEINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OEADJPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="OEOTHERPRINTTEMPLATEID" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CONTACTINFO">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="CONTACTNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="BILLTO">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="CONTACTNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="SHIPTO">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="CONTACTNAME" type="xs:string"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="OBJECTRESTRICTION" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS" type="xs:string"/>
              <xs:element name="CUSTOMFIELD1" type="xs:string"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Properties.Value:
<Request>
  <CUSTOMER>
    <CUSTOMERID>C1234</CUSTOMERID>
    <NAME>SaaS Company Inc</NAME>
    <DISPLAYCONTACT>

      <URL2/>

        <CITY>San Jose</CITY>
        <STATE>CA</STATE>
        <ZIP>95110</ZIP>
        <COUNTRY>United States</COUNTRY>

    </DISPLAYCONTACT>
    <ONETIME>false</ONETIME>
    <STATUS>active</STATUS>
    <HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>false</HIDEDISPLAYCONTACT>
    <CUSTTYPE>SaaS</CUSTTYPE>
    <PARENTID>C5678</PARENTID>
    <GLGROUP>Group</GLGROUP>
    <TERRITORYID>NE</TERRITORYID>
    <SUPDOCID>A1234</SUPDOCID>
    <TERMNAME>N30</TERMNAME>
    <OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>1200</OFFSETGLACCOUNTNO>
    <ARACCOUNT>4000</ARACCOUNT>
    <SHIPPINGMETHOD>USPS</SHIPPINGMETHOD>
    <RESALENO>123</RESALENO>
    <TAXID>12-3456789</TAXID>
    <CREDITLIMIT>1234.56</CREDITLIMIT>
    <ONHOLD>false</ONHOLD>
    <DELIVERY_OPTIONS>Print</DELIVERY_OPTIONS>
    <CUSTMESSAGEID>hello</CUSTMESSAGEID>
    <COMMENTS>my comment</COMMENTS>
    <CURRENCY>USD</CURRENCY>
    <ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>temp1</ARINVOICEPRINTTEMPLATEID>

    <CONTACTINFO>
      <CONTACTNAME>primary</CONTACTNAME>
    </CONTACTINFO>
    <BILLTO>
      <CONTACTNAME>bill to</CONTACTNAME>
    </BILLTO>
    <SHIPTO>
      <CONTACTNAME>ship to</CONTACTNAME>
    </SHIPTO>
    <OBJECTRESTRICTION>Restricted</OBJECTRESTRICTION>
    <RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS>100#~#200</RESTRICTEDLOCATIONS>
    <RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS>D100#~#D200</RESTRICTEDDEPARTMENTS>
    <CUSTOMFIELD1>Hello</CUSTOMFIELD1>
  </CUSTOMER>
  <CUSTOMER>

Nodes.Name: IfVisualBasic
Nodes.LongDescription: We check to see if the create in Sage was Successful or not.

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we write away a Successful Key Value record, so that this specific employee(key) is not processed by this integration again.

Nodes.Name: SetKeyValue2
Nodes.LongDescription: Here we write away an Error Key Value record, so that if this employee(Key) get's processed again, it will try and run the update again, until this changes to Successful.

Name: BambooHR to Sage Intacct Customers
Description: This Workflow retrieves employee records from BambooHR and attempts to create corresponding user records in the Sage Intacct Customer table. Successes and failures are logged as key-value records to prevent duplicate processing in future runs.
